programme.title: After The Fight - Adam Price
programme.sub-title: After The Fight - Adam Price
programme.desc: Every sport has it's unique set of injuries - however, fighters deal with injury more often than the average athlete. After every fight a fighter must push themselves to get healthy to be ready to fight again. After the Fight looks at the physical and mental struggles of fighters after a fight and how they begin to recover. Featuring Adam Price

programme.title: Out of the Cage - Jared Tordoff
programme.sub-title: Out of the Cage - Jared Tordoff
programme.desc: Out of the Cage reveals the private thoughts and emotions of an MMA fighter, the ambition that drives them and how they are affected when encountering defeat or facing triumph. Featuring Jared Tordoff at HK52

programme.title: Fighter Profile: Sean Michaels
programme.sub-title: Fighter Profile: Sean Michaels
programme.desc: Every athlete has their own unique way to be the best. We focus on the details of their training and why they think they have been successful. Gain insight on the featured athlete from their coaches and training partners - as well as the athlete themselves - about preparing for their sport. What do they bring to the sport as individuals - and what do they gain by being at the top of their game? Featuring Sean Michaels

programme.title: KARATE COMBAT: ONE WORLD - Andras Virag vs. Adham Sabry
programme.sub-title: KARATE COMBAT: ONE WORLD - Andras Virag vs. Adham Sabry
programme.desc: Live from New York City, NY on Sept. 27, 2018, Karate Combat: One World is the third event of the Karate Combat fighting league's inaugural season. Heldatop the Freedom Tower on the 102nd Floor Observation Deck of One World Trade Center building. On the Main Card: Abdalla Ibrahim of the US/Egypt vs.Dionicio Gustavo of Dominican Republic. The co-main event features Brazilâ€™s Luis Rocha and Dimitris Triantafyllis of Greece. A stacked card of 9 fights also featuresElhadji Ndour, Josh Quayhagen, and newcomers Adilet Shadykanov and Edgars Skrivers.
